Experience.Description: Allow Nephrologists to view relevant patient transplant information by integrating existing transplant records into the Nephrology module
Assist Prof. Kan Shao in using and refining Bayesian benchmark dose response modeling system. As well as adding features to the web-based dose response system
Assist Prof. Saúl Blanco in instruction of Introduction to Artificial Intelligence, hold office hours to help students understand class material, and grade homework and exam questions
Assisted Prof. Dan German in creating and refining a new course for students in computer science on quantum computing
Worked with Prof. Mark Messier to complete a rigorous curriculum introducing the basic computations used in neutrino experimentation, and mentored less experienced members in Python.

Awards.Description: Awarded to IU’s most academically distinguished undergraduates for maintaining a cumulative 3.8 GPA

Awards.Title: Indiana University College of Arts and Sciences Executive Dean’s List
Awards.Description: Highly selective academic distinction honoring students within the College of Arts and Sciences maintaining a 3.7 GPA while enrolled in rigorous coursework.

Awards.Title: Organic Chemistry II Student Award
Awards.Description: Award given to the top student in the second semester of organic chemistry lecture.

Positions.Title: President
Positions.Description: I led the Student Government in various funcitons, including creating enriching programs for residents of Wells Quad or elevating the concerns of community members to University staff

Positions.Description: I performed various administrative tasks within the Student Government in order to keep it running smoothly

Positions.Title: Director of Programming
Positions.Description: I created and planned social, philanthropic, and cultural events for residents of Wells Quad.

Activities.Description: I taught third graders biology lessons using prepared games and activities once a week.
I helped create enriching experiences for honors students living in Wells Quad.
